Class BookingService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.BookingService
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookingServiceInterface
public class BookingService extends Object implements BookingServiceInterface
Service class for handling all booking-related operations. Manages slot availability checks, booking creation, cancellations, and waitlist integration.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookingService()
    Instantiates a new booking service and initializes the DAO.

    • checkAvailability

      public boolean checkAvailability(int slotId, Date date)
      Checks if a specific slot is available for booking on a given date.
      Specified by:
      checkAvailability in interface BookingServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique ID of the slot
      date - the date of the booking
      Returns:
      true if the slot has available capacity, false otherwise

    • bookSlot

      public int bookSlot(int userId, int slotId, Date date) throws SlotNotAvailableException
      Attempts to book a slot for a user. If the slot is full, the user is added to the waitlist.
      Specified by:
      bookSlot in interface BookingServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user booking the slot
      slotId - the ID of the slot to book
      date - the date for which to book the slot
      Returns:
      the booking ID if successful, -1 if added to waitlist, or 0 if booking failed
      Throws:
      SlotNotAvailableException - if the slot and waitlist are both full

    • cancelBooking

      public boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId) throws BookingNotDoneException
      Cancels an existing booking and updates slot availability. If there are users on the waitlist for this slot, the first user is promoted.
      Specified by:
      cancelBooking in interface BookingServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique ID of the booking to cancel
      Returns:
      true if cancellation was successful, false if booking was already cancelled or not found
      Throws:
      BookingNotDoneException - if the booking does not exist

    • getBookingsByUser

      public List<Booking> getBookingsByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings (both confirmed and cancelled) for a specific user.
      Specified by:
      getBookingsByUser in interface BookingServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of all bookings for the user

    • getActiveBookingsByUser

      public List<Booking> getActiveBookingsByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves only confirmed/active bookings for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:

      Throws:
